explains: n. 岩鱼（栖于礁石中的鱼）

sentences.en: In the first part, collected rockfish samples monthly by the inshore of Qingdao were measured biologically, then the otolithes were taken and dried.
sentences.cn: 在第一部分中，通过在青岛近海逐月采集许氏平鲉的样品，进行生物学测量，并摘取耳石。

sentences.en: And naked mole rats aren't alone in not aging: rockfish, lobsters, and bristlecone pines also seem to stay forever young... or at least forever middle-aged.
sentences.cn: 不会变老的不只有裸鼹鼠：岩鱼龙虾和狐尾松都能永葆青春…要么拥永葆中年。
